metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3044 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low.
metadata.Description: An excessively large PDF page size (found in fuzz testing, unlikely in normal PDF files) can result in a divide-by-zero in Xpdf's text extraction code. This is related to CVE-2022-30524, but the problem here is caused by a very large page size, rather than by a very large character coordinate.

criterions.comment: ipe package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
xpdf package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
